faqs.question: What services do you offer?
faqs.answer: We offer a range of home services, including salon services, AC & appliance repair, plumbing, electrical work, pest control, painting, body massage, home cleaning, and more.

faqs.question: How do I book a service?
faqs.answer: You can book a service through our website by selecting the desired service, choosing a time slot, and confirming your booking.

faqs.question: What are the charges for each service?
faqs.answer: The pricing depends on the type of service, location, and complexity of the task. You can check the pricing details on our website before booking.

faqs.question: Do you offer emergency services?
faqs.answer: Yes, we provide emergency services for specific categories like plumbing, electrical repairs, and AC repairs. Additional charges may apply.

faqs.question: Can I schedule a service for a specific date and time?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can select your preferred date and time while booking the service.

faqs.question: Do I need to provide any tools or materials?
faqs.answer: Our professionals carry the necessary tools. However, for certain services, you may need to provide specific materials. This will be mentioned at the time of booking.

faqs.question: How can I check the availability of a service provider?
faqs.answer: You can check availability by selecting your location and preferred service on our website.

faqs.question: Can I cancel or reschedule a booking?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can cancel or reschedule your booking through your account before the scheduled time. Please check our cancellation policy for details.

faqs.question: How much advance notice is required for cancellation?
faqs.answer: Cancellations should be made at least 24 hours in advance to avoid cancellation fees.

faqs.question: Will I get a refund if I cancel my booking?
faqs.answer: Refund policies depend on the service type and cancellation timing. Please refer to our refund policy for details.

faqs.question: Can I book multiple services at once?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can add multiple services to your booking and schedule them accordingly.

faqs.question: How is the pricing calculated?
faqs.answer: Pricing is based on service type, duration, and complexity. Additional charges may apply for urgent bookings.

faqs.question: Do you have any discounts or offers?
faqs.answer: Yes, we frequently offer discounts and promotions. Check our website or subscribe to our newsletter for updates.

faqs.question: What payment methods do you accept?
faqs.answer: We accept online payments via credit/debit cards, UPI, and digital wallets. Some services may offer cash-on-delivery payment options.

faqs.question: Is there an option for cash-on-delivery payment?
faqs.answer: Yes, certain services offer cash-on-delivery. The availability will be shown at checkout.

faqs.question: Will I receive an invoice or receipt?
faqs.answer: Yes, you will receive an invoice via email after booking confirmation.

faqs.question: How can I contact customer support?
faqs.answer: You can contact us via phone, email, or live chat on our website.

faqs.question: What should I do if the service provider doesn’t show up?
faqs.answer: In case of no-show, please contact our support team, and we will assist you with a reschedule or refund.

faqs.question: How do I file a complaint or give feedback?
faqs.answer: You can share your feedback or file a complaint through the 'Customer Feedback' section on our website.

faqs.question: Is there a guarantee on the services provided?
faqs.answer: Yes, we offer a satisfaction guarantee. If you're not happy with the service, we will try to resolve your concern.

faqs.question: Are your service providers verified and background-checked?
faqs.answer: Yes, all service providers undergo a background check and verification process.

faqs.question: What happens if an item is damaged during service?
faqs.answer: In case of damage, please report it immediately to our support team. Compensation policies apply.

faqs.question: Do you provide a warranty for repairs and installations?
faqs.answer: Yes, we offer a warranty for certain services. Warranty details are mentioned at the time of booking.

faqs.question: How do I ensure my personal safety when hiring a service provider?
faqs.answer: We recommend checking the provider’s ID and verifying details before allowing them into your home. Our team ensures the highest safety standards.
